Text: Thanks a lot! especially for classifying the books.
Does anyone know where I can get recipe or cooking books formated for Kindle from, they aren't easy to convert for kindle... Thanx
How do I copy them to my kindle

Hello and thank you for all you hard work. I am looking for the following eBooks in mobi or epub. Hope you or anyone reading this post can help. Many thanks everyone.

THE BOOK OF LIES by Mary Horlock 
SIDEREAL  by Rachel Boast 
CHAVS  by Owen Jones .
THE NIGHT CIRCUS by Erin Morgenstern.
DOWN THE RABBIT HOLE by Juan Pablo Villalobos
THE COLLABORATOR by Mirza Waheed
THE SUBMISSION by Amy Waldman
Thanks a lot for these books. I'm excited by the Philosophy & Science section which looks like a thoughtful and radical collection!
